title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Immersive Learning Design Using Virtual Reality for Architectural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain 3D spatial design concepts with over 80% accuracy using IVE (Immersive Virtual Environments)
Learners can identify and correct structural issues in self-designed buildings during at least three PBL (Problem-Based Learning) projects while freely navigating virtual environments
Learners can improve design proposals based on VR feedback to achieve peer and instructor evaluations of 4.0/5.0 or higher
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
